blurbs.text: Arizona improved 6 spots in @taxfoundation's corp tax rankings after a phasedown to 4.9% corp rate
Local sales tax hikes made California less competitive in @taxfoundation's sales tax rankings
Ranked 48th on @taxfoundation's Index, California's tax system is volatile due to progressivity
Illinois's corp income tax hike (7.75-9.5%) helped it drop to 29th in @taxfoundation's rankings
Illinois's ind income tax hike (3.75-4.95%) helped it drop to 29th in @taxfoundation rankings
Kansas added new income tax bracket, 5.2% top rate, slipping 3 places on @taxfoundation's rankings
New Mexico's cont'd corp tax cuts improved the state 1 place on @taxfoundation's corp tax rankings
NC lowered it's individual income tax to 5.499%, improving its place in @taxfoundation's rankings
NC lowered it's corp income tax to 3%, improving its corp tax ranking on @taxfoundation's rankings
Rhode Island unemp. insur. reform drove their UI rank from 50 to 23 in @taxfoundation's rankings
Cont'd reform, including a corp rate cut, improved DC 2 places in @taxfoundation's corp tax rankings
Oregon is 10th in @taxfoundation rankings, but recent gross receipts tax proposals could change that
Virginia has low taxes, but a poorly structured system, ranking 31st in @taxfoundation's rankings
Texas, a low tax state, is 13th in @taxfoundation rankings, but its "Margin Tax" still holds it back
Arkansas only places 39th in @taxfoundation's rankings but has the opportunity for real improvement
Connecticut is 44th in @taxfoundation's rankings & faces major budget issues. Tax reform is overdue
Ohio ranks 47 on corp taxes in @taxfoundation ranking due to its destructive Commerical Activity Tax
Pennsylvania is 26th in @taxfoundation rankings, but faces big budget issues. Tax reform is overdue
